description: Teacher approval gates for high-risk outputs.
notes: Mandatory for grades and SPED final exports.

description: Generated artifacts and versions by medium.
example_fields: artifact_id, request_id, medium_type, language, tier, version
notes: Core output inventory and delivery record.

description: Document and image extraction metadata without raw student text logs.
notes: Store metadata and references; avoid unnecessary raw retention.

description: Class level settings and routine template context.
notes: Needed to generate realistic daily artifacts.

description: District and DOE policy toggles and retention settings.

notes: Most valuable supervision signal for model and template tuning.

description: Final delivery medium and destination event.
notes: Tracks workflow completion and medium preference.

description: Language distribution and support requirements by class.
notes: Drives multilingual and ESL support at generation time.

description: Teacher quality rating and time-saved self report.
notes: Supports KPI tracking and iterative product improvements.

description: Agent decomposition and task execution graph.
notes: Critical for debugging and improving one-shot planner.

description: Prompt plus attachment metadata and intent labels.
notes: Primary training signal for orchestration quality.

description: Teacher account and preferences for personalization.
notes: Core to one-shot quality and medium selection.
